title: General
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for: anaphora or tricolon crescens. (Rhetorical question, while not on the required list, is also acceptable.)
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: anaphora or tricolon crescens. (Rhetorical question, while not on the required list, is also acceptable.)

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: anaphora or tricolon crescens. (Rhetorical question, while not on the required list, is also acceptable.)
